verbs.description: [ARG1: rosemary leg of lamb roast lamb] [V: is] [ARG2: a treat for our family] [ARGM-TMP: at easter time] and on other special occasions before putting the meat in the oven i rub on a mixture of garlic rosemary salt and pepper which enhances the flavor -marie hattrup sparks nevada rosemary leg
